text: Felipe Quispe Huanca "Mallku" (Quechua language: "condor"; 22 August 1942 - 19 January 2021) was a Bolivian historian and political leader. He was the leader of the Pachakuti Indigenous Movement (MIP) and was general secretary of the United Union Confederation of Working Peasants of Bolivia (CSUTCB). He unsuccessfully ran for President of Bolivia in 2005. Quispe died on 19 January 2021 in El Alto, Bolivia from cardiac arrest at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Bolivian politicians Category:Historians
title: Felipe Quispe
